SectionBody.Text: The court retains jurisdiction over all guardianships. The court shall review the appropriateness and extent of a guardianship annually and:

Subsection.Text: If an objection to the terms of the guardianship report has been filed pursuant to s. 744.367;
If interim review has been requested under s. 744.3715;
If a person, including the ward, has filed a suggestion of increased capacity; or
If the guardianship report has not been received and the guardian has failed to respond to a show cause order.
